wikipedia_page.main: James Connor (1 June 1909 – 8 May 1980) was a Scottish footballer who played for Sunderland and the Scotland national football team as an outside left. He was born in Renfrew, Scotland.

response: *Jimmy Connor (footballer, born 1881), Scottish association football defender who played for Blackpool
*Jimmy Connor (footballer, born 1909) (1909–1980), association football winger who played for Sunderland and Scotland
*Jimmy Connor (footballer, born 1938), English association football winger who played for Darlington
